vars.original_input:
#%RAML 1.0

types:
  User:
    type: object
    properties:
      id:
        type: string
        format: uuid
      username:
        type: string
        required: true
      email:
        type: string
        required: true
        format: email
      createdAt:
        type: datetime
      updatedAt:
        type: datetime

traits:
  paged:
    queryParameters:
      limit:
        type: integer
        default: 20
        description: Maximum number of items to return
      offset:
        type: integer
        default: 0
        description: Number of items to skip

/users:
  get:
    description: Returns all users
    is: [paged]
    responses:
      200:
        body:
          application/json:
            type: array
            items: User
  
  post:
    description: Creates a new user
    body:
      application/json:
        properties:
          username:
            type: string
            required: true
          email:
            type: string
            required: true
            format: email
    responses:
      201:
        body:
          application/json:
            type: User
      400:
        description: Bad request when validation fails

  /{id}:
    uriParameters:
      id:
        type: string
        required: true
    
    get:
      description: Returns a specific user
      responses:
        200:
          body:
            application/json:
              type: User
        404:
          description: User not found
    
    put:
      description: Updates a user
      body:
        application/json:
          properties:
            username:
              type: string
              required: false
            email:
              type: string
              required: false
              format: email
      responses:
        200:
          body:
            application/json:
              type: User
        404:
          description: User not found
    
    delete:
      description: Deletes a user
      responses:
        204:
          description: User successfully deleted
        404:
          description: User not found
